page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: There are three farms in this area all of which use most of their land for{arable farming}The main crops are wheat and peas which are grown in large quantities,other crops such as barley, cabbages,tomatoes and cauliflower are also grown. {Sheep}are also kept and are left to graze on the{rough grazing land.}The lambs are slaughtered and sold on the Island. The other form of farming in this area is{dairy farming.}The main breed of cattle is the fresian cow. The produce is sold locally in the form of milk,cheese and butter and is priced cheaper than many of the Island shops.
